Premature babies’ skin is 
even	more	delicate.	Staff	in	a	
specialised neonatal area will 
advise you on skin care.
If your baby is overdue, their 
skin may well be dry and 
appear cracked. This is to be 
expected, as the protective 
vernix has all been absorbed. 
Don’t be tempted to use any 
creams or lotions as they may 
do more harm than good.
